description: Deletes the specified database and all of its associated data. This action is irreversible. You must copy any data out of the database before deleting it if the data is to be retained.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the kdb database that you want to delete.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
